name: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 1
description: Azurael's Circle: Chapter 1 is a horror-mystery adventure game where you must find the truth about your mother's death. What evils await you in the depths of the Lancaster farmhouse? The further you go, the more strange things get.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB VRAM, 3D accelerator compatible w/ DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space
